column.name: deleted
column.remarks: 逻辑删除 0：未删除，1：已删除

column.name: targetType
column.remarks: 发送到类型(all : 全部,user:单个人)

column.name: targetTos
column.remarks: 发送到用户主键（多个用“;"分隔)

column.name: type
column.remarks: 类型(0:系统组织机构，不允许删除，可修改 1：普通组织机构，无删除、修改限制）

column.name: organizationCategoryId
column.remarks: 组织机构类型（数据字典，参照：base_organizationcategory）

column.name: type
column.remarks: 类型(0:系统岗位，不允许删除，可修改 1：普通岗位，无删除、修改限制）

column.name: roleCategoryId
column.remarks: 岗位类型（数据字典，参照：base_rolecategory）

column.name: shouldChangePassword
column.remarks: 是否应修改密码(逻辑未实现)

column.name: operationStepDesc
column.remarks: 具体维护操作步骤描述

column.name: status
column.remarks: 状态（Draft:草稿;Approving:审批中;Finished:审批完成;ReRequest:驳回申请人;Declined:拒绝;Canceled:撤销;Error:错误;Suspend:挂起）

column.name: actUserSource
column.remarks: 办理人来源(asignee:办理 :,delegate:委派 ,redirect:转办，claim:签收)

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `r`.`id` AS `ID_`,NULL AS `REV_`,`r`.`name` AS `NAME_`,`r`.`type` AS `TYPE_` from `jrtech`.`base_role` `r`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `u`.`id` AS `ID_`,0 AS `REV_`,NULL AS `USER_ID_`,NULL AS `TYPE_`,NULL AS `KEY_`,NULL AS `VALUE_`,`u`.`loginPassword` AS `PASSWORD_`,NULL AS `PARENT_ID_` from `jrtech`.`base_user` `u`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `au`.`loginId` AS `ID_`,0 AS `REV_`,`au`.`name` AS `FIRST_`,'' AS `LAST_`,`au`.`email` AS `EMAIL_`,'' AS `PWD_`,'' AS `PICTURE_ID_` from `jrtech`.`base_user` `au`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`parentId` AS `parentId`,`aa`.`name` AS `name`,`aa`.`remark` AS `remark`,`aa`.`address` AS `address`,`aa`.`postNO` AS `postNO`,`aa`.`type` AS `type`,`aa`.`organizationCategoryId` AS `organizationCategoryId`,`aa`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`aa`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`aa`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`aa`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`aa`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`aa`.`departmentId` AS `departmentId`,(select `jrtech`.`base_organization`.`name` from `jrtech`.`base_organization` where (`jrtech`.`base_organization`.`id` = `aa`.`departmentId`)) AS `departmentName` from (select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`parentId` AS `parentId`,`a`.`name` AS `name`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`address` AS `address`,`a`.`postNO` AS `postNO`,`a`.`type` AS `type`,`a`.`organizationCategoryId` AS `organizationCategoryId`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`BASE_GETORGANIZATIONOFDEPARTMENTID`(`a`.`id`) AS `departmentId` from `jrtech`.`base_organization` `a`) `aa`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`organizationId` AS `organizationId`,`a`.`name` AS `name`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`type` AS `type`,`a`.`roleCategoryId` AS `roleCategoryId`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`b`.`id` AS `groupId`,`b`.`name` AS `groupName`,`b`.`departmentId` AS `departmentId`,`b`.`departmentName` AS `departmentName` from (`jrtech`.`base_role` `a` left join `jrtech`.`base_v_group_department` `b` on((`a`.`organizationId` = `b`.`id`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`name` AS `name`,`a`.`beanName` AS `beanName`,`a`.`methodName` AS `methodName`,`a`.`params` AS `params`,`a`.`cronExpression` AS `cronExpression`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`b`.`result` AS `lastLogResult`,`b`.`executeTime` AS `lastLogExecuteTime` from (`jrtech`.`base_schedule_job` `a` left join (select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`jobId` AS `jobId`,`aa`.`jobName` AS `jobName`,`aa`.`beanName` AS `beanName`,`aa`.`methodName` AS `methodName`,`aa`.`params` AS `params`,`aa`.`duration` AS `duration`,`aa`.`result` AS `result`,`aa`.`errorMessage` AS `errorMessage`,`aa`.`errorStackTrace` AS `errorStackTrace`,`aa`.`executeTime` AS `executeTime`,`aa`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`aa`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`aa`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`aa`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`aa`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion` from (`jrtech`.`base_schedule_job_log` `aa` join (select `jrtech`.`base_schedule_job_log`.`jobId` AS `jobId`,max(`jrtech`.`base_schedule_job_log`.`id`) AS `maxId` from `jrtech`.`base_schedule_job_log` group by `jrtech`.`base_schedule_job_log`.`jobId`) `bb` on((`aa`.`id` = `bb`.`maxId`)))) `b` on((`a`.`id` = `b`.`jobId`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`name` AS `name`,`a`.`age` AS `age`,`a`.`birthday` AS `birthday`,`a`.`loginId` AS `loginId`,`a`.`loginPassword` AS `loginPassword`,`a`.`activited` AS `activited`,`a`.`mobile` AS `mobile`,`a`.`email` AS `email`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`lastLoginTime` AS `lastLoginTime`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`a`.`shouldChangePassword` AS `shouldChangePassword`,`c`.`roleCategoryId` AS `roleCategoryId`,`c`.`groupId` AS `groupId`,`c`.`groupName` AS `groupName`,`c`.`departmentId` AS `departmentId`,`c`.`departmentName` AS `departmentName` from ((`jrtech`.`base_user` `a` join `jrtech`.`base_user_role` `b` on((`a`.`id` = `b`.`userId`))) join `jrtech`.`base_v_role_group_department` `c` on((`b`.`roleId` = `c`.`id`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`customerCode` AS `customerCode`,`a`.`customerName` AS `customerName`,`a`.`customerCardNO` AS `customerCardNO`,`a`.`loanTermCount` AS `loanTermCount`,`a`.`loanMoneyAmount` AS `loanMoneyAmount`,`a`.`originalLoanMoneyAmount` AS `originalLoanMoneyAmount`,`a`.`financeFamilyTotalAsset` AS `financeFamilyTotalAsset`,`a`.`financeReturnMoneyLoanRate` AS `financeReturnMoneyLoanRate`,`a`.`loanApplyDate` AS `loanApplyDate`,`a`.`loanApplySumbitDate` AS `loanApplySumbitDate`,`a`.`trackingPersonInfoMRId` AS `trackingPersonInfoMRId`,`a`.`sexId` AS `sexId`,`a`.`jobId` AS `jobId`,`a`.`maritalStatusIds` AS `maritalStatusIds`,`a`.`educationalLevelIds` AS `educationalLevelIds`,`a`.`socialSecurityId` AS `socialSecurityId`,`a`.`companyWorkTermIds` AS `companyWorkTermIds`,`a`.`activited` AS `activited`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`time1` AS `time1`,`a`.`time2` AS `time2`,`c`.`name` AS `trackingPersonInfoMRName` from (`jrtech`.`pl_loan_doc` `a` left join `jrtech`.`base_v_user_group_department` `c` on(((`a`.`trackingPersonInfoMRId` = `c`.`id`) and (`c`.`roleCategoryId` = 'base_rolecategory_trackingpersoninfomr'))))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`assignee` AS `assignee`,`a`.`attorney` AS `attorney`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`a`.`attorney`) AS `attorneyName`,`a`.`startTime` AS `startTime`,`a`.`endTime` AS `endTime`,`a`.`processDefinitionKey` AS `processDefinitionKey`,(select `jrtech`.`act_re_model`.`NAME_` from `jrtech`.`act_re_model` where (`jrtech`.`act_re_model`.`KEY_` = `a`.`processDefinitionKey`)) AS `processDefinitionName`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion` from `jrtech`.`wf_task_agent` `a`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`ID_` AS `id`,`a`.`NAME_` AS `name`,`a`.`KEY_` AS `key`,`a`.`CATEGORY_` AS `category`,json_unquote(json_extract(`a`.`META_INFO_`,'$.procInstStartUrl')) AS `procInstStartUrl`,json_unquote(json_extract(`a`.`META_INFO_`,'$.procInstStartRePerm')) AS `procInstStartRequiredPermissionId`,json_unquote(json_extract(`a`.`META_INFO_`,'$.procInstDraftUrl')) AS `procInstDraftUrl`,json_unquote(json_extract(`a`.`META_INFO_`,'$.procInstViewUrl')) AS `procInstViewUrl`,json_unquote(json_extract(`a`.`META_INFO_`,'$.description')) AS `description` from `jrtech`.`act_re_model` `a`

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`ID_` AS `taskId`,`a`.`PROC_INST_ID_` AS `processInstId`,`a`.`TASK_DEF_KEY_` AS `taskActId`,`a`.`NAME_` AS `taskActName`,`a`.`ASSIGNEE_` AS `taskAssignee`,`i`.`USER_ID` AS `taskCandidate`,`a`.`CREATE_TIME_` AS `taskCreateDate`,`a`.`FORM_KEY_` AS `taskFormKey`,`a`.`DELEGATION_` AS `DELEGATION_ID`,`a`.`DESCRIPTION_` AS `DESCRIPTION`,`a`.`DUE_DATE_` AS `DUE_DATE` from (`jrtech`.`act_ru_task` `a` left join (select distinct `u`.`TASK_ID_` AS `TASK_ID_`,`u`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID` from (select `i`.`TASK_ID_` AS `TASK_ID_`,`i`.`USER_ID_` AS `USER_ID` from (`jrtech`.`act_ru_identitylink` `i` join `jrtech`.`act_ru_task` `t`) where ((`i`.`TASK_ID_` is not null) and (`i`.`USER_ID_` is not null) and (`i`.`TASK_ID_` = `t`.`ID_`) and isnull(`t`.`ASSIGNEE_`) and (`i`.`TYPE_` = 'candidate')) union select `i`.`TASK_ID_` AS `TASK_ID_`,`r`.`USER_ID_` AS `USER_ID` from ((`jrtech`.`act_ru_identitylink` `i` join `jrtech`.`act_id_membership` `r`) join `jrtech`.`act_ru_task` `t`) where ((`i`.`TASK_ID_` is not null) and (`i`.`GROUP_ID_` is not null) and (`i`.`TASK_ID_` = `t`.`ID_`) and isnull(`t`.`ASSIGNEE_`) and (`i`.`TYPE_` = 'candidate') and (`i`.`GROUP_ID_` = `r`.`GROUP_ID_`))) `u`) `i` on((`a`.`ID_` = `i`.`TASK_ID_`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`processDefinationKey` AS `processDefinationKey`,`b`.`name` AS `processDefinationName`,`b`.`procInstStartUrl` AS `procInstStartUrl`,`b`.`procInstDraftUrl` AS `procInstDraftUrl`,`b`.`procInstViewUrl` AS `procInstViewUrl`,`a`.`businessId` AS `businessId`,`a`.`origiator` AS `origiator`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`a`.`origiator`) AS `origiatorName`,`a`.`startDate` AS `startDate`,`a`.`saveDate` AS `saveDate`,`a`.`endDate` AS `endDate`,`a`.`folio` AS `folio`,`a`.`originalStatus` AS `originalStatus`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion` from ((`jrtech`.`wf_processinst` `a` join `jrtech`.`wf_v_processdef` `b` on((`a`.`processDefinationKey` = `b`.`key`))) left join `jrtech`.`wf_v_todotask` `d` on((`a`.`id` = `d`.`processInstId`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `aaa`.`id` AS `id`,`aaa`.`processInstId` AS `processInstId`,`aaa`.`actUserId` AS `taskActUserId`,`aaa`.`actUserName` AS `taskActUserName`,`aaa`.`actId` AS `taskActId`,`aaa`.`actName` AS `taskActName`,`aaa`.`doAction` AS `taskDoAction`,`aaa`.`result` AS `taskResult`,`aaa`.`remark` AS `taskRemark`,`aaa`.`startDate` AS `taskStartDate`,`aaa`.`endDate` AS `taskEndDate`,`aaa`.`status` AS `taskStatus`,`bbb`.`processDefinationKey` AS `processDefinationKey`,`bbb`.`processDefinationName` AS `processDefinationName`,`bbb`.`procInstStartUrl` AS `procInstStartUrl`,`bbb`.`procInstDraftUrl` AS `procInstDraftUrl`,`bbb`.`procInstViewUrl` AS `procInstViewUrl`,`bbb`.`businessId` AS `businessId`,`bbb`.`origiator` AS `origiator`,`bbb`.`origiatorName` AS `origiatorName`,`bbb`.`startDate` AS `startDate`,`bbb`.`saveDate` AS `saveDate`,`bbb`.`endDate` AS `endDate`,`bbb`.`folio` AS `folio`,`bbb`.`originalStatus` AS `originalStatus`,`bbb`.`status` AS `status`,`bbb`.`remark` AS `remark` from (((select -(1) AS `id`,`a`.`id` AS `processInstId`,`a`.`origiator` AS `actUserId`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`a`.`origiator`) AS `actUserName`,'enter' AS `actId`,'进件' AS `actName`,'Submit' AS `doAction`,'提交' AS `result`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`saveDate` AS `startDate`,`a`.`startDate` AS `endDate`,'已提交' AS `status` from `jrtech`.`wf_processinst` `a`) union select `a`.`id` AS `id`,`a`.`processInstId` AS `processInstId`,`a`.`actUserId` AS `actUserId`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`a`.`actUserId`) AS `actUserName`,`a`.`actId` AS `actId`,`a`.`actName` AS `actName`,`a`.`doAction` AS `doAction`,`a`.`result` AS `result`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,NULL AS `startDate`,`a`.`actionDate` AS `endDate`,'已办结' AS `status` from `jrtech`.`wf_processinsthistory` `a` union all select `a`.`taskId` AS `id`,`a`.`processInstId` AS `ProcessInstId`,(case when isnull(`a`.`taskCandidate`) then `a`.`taskAssignee` else `a`.`taskCandidate` end) AS `actUserId`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`((case when isnull(`a`.`taskCandidate`) then `a`.`taskAssignee` else `a`.`taskCandidate` end)) AS `actUserName`,`a`.`taskActId` AS `actId`,`a`.`taskActName` AS `actName`,'' AS `doAction`,(case when isnull(`a`.`taskCandidate`) then '待办理' else '待签收' end) AS `result`,'' AS `remark`,`a`.`taskCreateDate` AS `startDate`,NULL AS `endDate`,(case when isnull(`a`.`taskCandidate`) then '待办理' else '待签收' end) AS `status` from `jrtech`.`wf_v_todotask` `a`) `aaa` join `jrtech`.`wf_v_processinst_full` `bbb` on((`aaa`.`processInstId` = `bbb`.`id`)))

changeSet.author: WangXun
changeSet.createView: select `d`.`taskId` AS `id`,`a`.`processDefinationKey` AS `processDefinationKey`,`a`.`processDefinationName` AS `processDefinationName`,`a`.`procInstStartUrl` AS `procInstStartUrl`,`a`.`procInstDraftUrl` AS `procInstDraftUrl`,`a`.`procInstViewUrl` AS `procInstViewUrl`,`a`.`businessId` AS `businessId`,`a`.`origiator` AS `origiator`,`a`.`origiatorName` AS `origiatorName`,`a`.`startDate` AS `startDate`,`a`.`saveDate` AS `saveDate`,`a`.`endDate` AS `endDate`,`a`.`folio` AS `folio`,`a`.`originalStatus` AS `originalStatus`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`remark` AS `remark`,`a`.`gmtCreatedBy` AS `gmtCreatedBy`,`a`.`gmtCreatedOn` AS `gmtCreatedOn`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedBy` AS `gmtUpdatedBy`,`a`.`gmtUpdatedOn` AS `gmtUpdatedOn`,`a`.`gmtVersion` AS `gmtVersion`,`d`.`taskId` AS `taskId`,`d`.`processInstId` AS `processInstId`,`d`.`taskActId` AS `taskActId`,`d`.`taskActName` AS `taskActName`,`d`.`taskAssignee` AS `taskAssignee`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`d`.`taskAssignee`) AS `taskAssigneeName`,`d`.`taskCandidate` AS `taskCandidate`,`BASE_GETUSERDISPLAYNAME`(`d`.`taskCandidate`) AS `taskCandidateName`,`d`.`taskCreateDate` AS `taskCreateDate`,`d`.`taskFormKey` AS `taskFormKey` from (`jrtech`.`wf_v_processinst_full` `a` join `jrtech`.`wf_v_todotask` `d` on((`a`.`id` = `d`.`processInstId`)))
